item.title: You Don't Hear "Big Data" Much Anymore, And For That I'm Thankful
item.description: This is about Big Data. You really can’t over-estimate what suckers business people are. I’m not talking about people who create things or improve things. Guys like Steve Jobs and Donald Trump built great businesses. But they weren’t business people. They were builders. Running a business was a necessary evil that allowed them the freedom to build what they wanted to build. They were great businessmen because they cared about the work their companies did.
